name: Zacian
description: Now armed with a weapon it used in ancient times, this Pokémon needs only a single strike to fell even Gigantamax Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Stream
attacks.effect: Attach a Metal Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Smashing Edge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.
